data.message: If u are a hater stay a fucken hater n dont support eminem u punk ass bitch boys are losers u aint no fan of eminem and stay da fuck away from dis you are as soft as babyshit follow trump dont follow Eminen da rap God slam shady Marshall Mathers motherfucker u need to start realising dat u are in a wrong business im not done wit u there are some business intrests explorin' im comin at yo...
